Requirements You are wielding your staff.

Make a Strike with your staff. As long as you don't critically fail, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] and takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its DC against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Tumble Through] attempts until the start of your next turn.

source.value: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
